Rich,
I expected that the display book from the SF show would be available in time for the Tampa show, but the guy who handles the publishing was still tweaking the work at the printer to improve the quality. They should be ready for Chicago in May.  Past books on blades looked very good, so it'll be interesting to see the improvement.  Yes, it's the NBTHK American branch that's producing it.  It will also cover the swords that were on display.

Jim



  Jim, great answer. I miss a bit being on the other side of the planet 
  LOL. If the Yagyu book comes out soon ( is that the NBTHK ) from your 
  exhibition, I will be up to date. Another great write up and much 
  appreciated.

  Best

  Rich
